data.message: Aw this is so petty ..instead of taking a few million out of your account ,you're donating $150 shoes?...nah...you can't be Eminem...no way Jose!

replies.message: If you knew,,, these are worth £15,000+
Pretty sure those are collab exclusive shoes cost around 10k on market.... but what do I know
Who cares.?..i wouldn't want them..my point is he's worth billions...don't be cheap and dig into your bank..he's gonna get tax breaks for donating anyways
I wouldn't want them even if he gave them to me ..honest to GOD
Teri got a point.. I don't have the money to donate or I would regardless of the shoes, although I would like to get them for sure... but it is what it is..
how do you know he hasnt donated tho its all fucking assumption
Don't comment when you don't know the value of these, they'll generate a LOT of donations from people who know what they are, just look at Air mag charity auctions
this shoe already helped make 78k in this auction....
Hey Jack Elliott..last time I looked at America,we are free to give opinions and again ,I don't give 3 flying fucks about famous people or famous shoes..humility and compassion is golden
people keen to talk shit about '$150 shoes' tho
Hope it does go to the poorest ..but somehow it passes dirty hands first..he should be in Puerto Rico right now giving out food and water from his private jet 🕇
Looool how much you donated Teri?
I can c where she coming from but he raised nearly 2 mill for the Manchester attack but I don't know about the hurricane

He is not worth billions he's worth right around 200 mil which most of it is tied up in his work. He can generate thousands of donations because of his following. I'm sure he has donated some of his money also.
Billions...lmao dummy
I live in Florida and I barely have food right now but that's my business.. I'm not asking anyone for anything ,I'm praying those who have less than me are blessed 🕇
Did u donate

He's doing the right thing for the right reasons, that's him, nobody told him to. He has a very good heart and in my opinion he really cares about people. He doesn't donate for the publicity, he doesn't need it. I think the shoes are to bring more donations in. If you listen and hear about things he does (quietly) he's a nice guy. I am sure he has probably donated in addition to doing this. The best thing about him is even though he is huge, he is humble and does what he does from the heart. If I could i would. Thanks Eminem.

Teri Deida What the fuck are you doing during all this, besides talking shit about people who have absolutely no obligation to even donate or help anyone???

Off your high horse lady, if you can even get on a horse
Hes also matching the donations up to 250k

Teri Deida, i'm sorry for your current situation. If you "don't give 3 flying f***s about famous people", why are you on here? Do your homework before assuming others positions. Em's a great humanitarian. https://www.insidephilanthropy.com/glitzy-giving/eminem.html ...& this link doesn't include his his recent charity events, including helping raise almost 2 Million for Manchester victims, (& the undisclosed amounts he donated.)

Teri Deida yep what I figured domb blonde wanta be. You don't know you hole in you Ass from hole in ground.  Em is one the best hearted rappers in the world. You don't like what he's doing to help out. FUCK OFF go somewhere else play childish games. It ain't nonua business how much money he's got or gives. He come from way down and come up to where he's at. He don't have to give shit to no one. Unless he wants to. And that's why he's doing this cause he has a heart. Do you need get off the man's page. And fuck with someone you like if that's possible. From looks of it you don't got a life. #get you a life and a JOB  Maybe you have some money
All the money raised for this Marshall has stated he will match it. Meaning currently Marshall is donating 80k+ .
I bet Eminems donated more than all the money you have made in your entire life. Just because you are wealthy doesnt mean you are obligated to give away millions of dollars.
Are you on Puerto Rico Teri Deida? Nah you're on your fat ass crying behind a screen about something you apparently don't give a flying fuck about. Sort your life out you absolute joke.
